text:
Laughter diffuses tension.
You can have that tough architecture discussion, and then laugh together and it reduces stress.

Job satisfaction is the #1 predictor of organizational performance. (these things happen together)

@holly_cummins #YowLondon

author.name: Jessica Joy Kerr
author.description: Symmathecist. Engineering Manager of Developer Relations, @honeycombio. Tweets are mine, license CC0. @jessitron@hachyderm.io pronouns=she/her
